author: holiman
content:
I still haven't written a good spec, but what I have done, is update the PR (https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/21502) . Specifically, the `evm t8n` tool. cc <@!393119312350543872> example usage is here: https://github.com/lightclient/go-ethereum/tree/impl-eip-2718/cmd/evm/testdata/8 . 

The two new features added are 1) that it supports ACL-transactions, and 2) that it supports signing, so that it can use `secretKey` to sign a tx (it requires v,r,s to be all zero in that case).
